headline: Five new Cloudflare data centers across the United States
keywords: March of Cloudflare, Data Center, United States, Texas, California, Cloudflare Network, Midwest, North America
description: When Cloudflare launched, three of the original five cities in our network were located in the United States. Since then, we have grown the breadth of the global network considerably to span 66 countries, and even added expanded the US footprint to twenty five locations.
